backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 50 Eglinton Avenue West

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 1641-2019 to designate the property at 50 Eglinton Avenue West (Eglinton-Lawrence - Ward 8) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 1641-2019 - To designate the property at 50 Eglinton Avenue West asbeing of cultural heritage value or interest.

2019.NY7.8 - Alterations to a Heritage Property, Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act, and Authority to Enter into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 50 Eglinton Avenue West

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and City of Toronto, Province of Ontario

topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
